description: [NightClub](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1090) can modify the Creation, Access, and Write timestamps for malicious DLLs to match those of the genuine Windows DLL user32.dll.(Citation: MoustachedBouncer ESET August 2023)

external_references.description: Faou, M. (2023, August 10). MoustachedBouncer: Espionage against foreign diplomats in Belarus. Retrieved September 25, 2023.
